channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- System x BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- System x BIOS

item.title: CVE-2019-6155|2024-09-16T18:24:36.117Z -- ibm -- system%20x%20bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was found in an SMI handler in various BIOS versions of certain legacy IBM System x and IBM BladeCenter systems that could lead to denial of service.
